titles.title: He Is Great! Great! Wonderful! Wonderful!

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
He is great! Great! Wonderful! Wonderful!
Mighty God is He!
Mighty God is He!
Well, He lifted me up, put a smile on my face,
Extended to me His mercy and grace,
Cleansed my heart from sin,
So I could serve only Him.
He strengthens me each day.
He is great! Great! Wonderful! Wonderful!
Mighty God is He.
Mighty God is He.
